Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

You can actually use it with the mobile app to search for the title, artist, actor or director, or just go old-school with our handy remote. Lose yourself in the ultimate viewing experience.

Smart TV with access to streaming services for entertainment: Enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top streaming services like Netflix, YouTube and many more right on your TV

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);

if (!input) {
return ”;

return input.substr(0, length);

return ”;

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:52 UTC – Details)


This Tracfone Alcatel A406 prepaid cell phone serves as a useful alternative to people who don’t want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this prepaid phone, You can pay as you go. This allows you to track the amount of money you’re spending easily. The prepaid Flip phone is easy to use and helps you keep track of your day-to-day. The phone book holds up to 1, 000 entries, and the hands-free speaker allows you to connect easily while driving. Listen to your favorite tunes on the MP3 player, and take photos and videos to share with friends and family.
Google Is Here To Assist You. As part of the KaiOS experience, the MY FLIP 2 comes preloaded with Google Assistant, which helps you get things done and find answers on the go, using just your voice.
Accessibility For All. The MY FLIP 2 comes with a host of accessibility features Real-Time-Text (RTT) and hearing aid compatibility that enables any user to easily stay connected. Plus, a dedicated external SOS button allows the user to call for help in case of an emergency.
BIG BUTTONS and large, legible numbers and make dialing effortless.
POWERFUL SPEAKER ensures every conversation will be loud and clear.

  1. Take control of your wireless life

    Tracfone offers Unlimited Talk and Text plans with Unlimited Carryover Data*

  2. Now you’re in control

    Experience wireless freedom. You don’t want to be locked into a contract, that’s why Tracfone doesn’t have them. Plus, there are no activation or cancellation fees, ever.



Choose Your Refill


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 3GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 4GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 8GB

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Plan Type

Plan Type

Data

8GB Carryover Data at High Speed

How will my plan card be delivered?

A physical Tracfone plan card will be shipped directly to you.

Do I need a PIN to go with this plan?

The PIN to activate your new plan is on the back of the plan card. You do not need a separate PIN.

Do I need a SIM card with this plan?

You’ll need a Tracfone compatible phone (which comes with a built-in SIM card) or Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit to activate service. If you already have an active Tracfone phone, add your plan to your account by following the instructions on the card.

How do I activate service with Tracfone?

You can activate service on the Tracfone website. You’ll need the IMEI/MEID/Serial # from a Tracfone phone or Tracfone SIM Card and a service plan PIN ready. Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in your package.

Where can I buy a phone that is compatible with this wireless service plan?

All Tracfone phones available on Amazon are compatible with this plan or you can activate service on a phone you already have with a Tracfone Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit.

Disclaimers

*Unlimited Carryover: For Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plans, any unused data after your service end date will carryover to the next cycle if active service is maintained and in use with any Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plan. For other service plans, any unused minutes, texts and data will not expire as long as any Tracfone service plan is active and in use within any six-month period.

4
Price: $19.88
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:52 UTC – Details)

Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At ImpiriLux, we are inspired by the joyous moments in all our lives, and our product selections are a reflection of that.

As a family business, we take pride in our beautiful products, excellent quality and customer dedication. Our original products are designed right here at home in the US and made by vetted world partners to ensure safety and quality for your family.

We aim to make your celebrations easier and more fun for everyone.

Beautiful Play Tents

Fun Tossing Games

Bop Bags for Active Play

Elegant Servingware

Impress Your Guests

ONE INFLATABLE TARGET WITH TWO SIDES – Whether it’s football season, baseball season or any season it is a great time for children to play and be active. Use it outdoors, indoors, at birthday parties, picnics or any gathering to add a fun activity.
MINI FOOTBALL AND BASEBALL – Soft foam filled mini football and baseball are included for fun right out of the box. The size of the balls have been specifically designed for kid’s small hands. A net is already attached to catch the balls.
QUICK SETUP – First fill the water-tight bottom chamber of the target with water or sand to keep it upright. Then fill the top with air. The great part is the special two stage air valve that makes inflation and deflation easy and fast.
SUPERIOR QUALITY – The target is constructed with phthalate free PVC. The plastic and printing conform to US toys safety standards. Each target is checked for defects by an 8 hour quality assurance inflation test.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Providing quality products and customer satisfaction is our priority. Love the target or return it for a refund.


Presenting the Ultimate 5 Foot Tall 2-in-1 Inflatable Football and Baseball Target Set


  • Kids and parents love the Imagenius Toys Inflatable Football and Baseball Target Set as a fun, healthy, interactive way to play and be physically active.
  • Boys and girls enjoy this target set inside the house, back yard, birthdays, carnivals, field day and just about any other day.
  • Adults find this set perfect for football and baseball parties, tailgating, picnics, and gift giving.
  • High quality materials and workmanship utilized to make a product that lasts.


Benefits

  • Play solo or with family and friends
  • Practice pitching and throwing
  • Play indoors or outdoors
  • Use year round for football and baseball seasons
  • Makes for an awesome gift

Features

  • Two-sided target (football and baseball)
  • 5 Feet tall when inflated
  • Includes mini football and baseball
  • Made of high quality heavy duty PVC fabric
  • Precision manufacturing and inflation testing to ensure durability
  • Beautifully illustrated design

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

setInitialStates(

Price: $39.99 - $33.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:44:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Premium Glow Products

Our story

How we got our start GlowCity started back in 2009 simply selling glow products at local fireworks events. We quickly discovered and created amazing glow products and started selling online. Selling our products on Amazon took our business to the next level and we continue to expand our product line! What makes our product unique We focus on only selling Premium glow products. We only want to sell products that truly amaze customers with every purchase! We want to provide our customers with the best of the best LED products in the world! Most of our products use LED lights for the most magnificent glow! Why we love what we do Selling glow products is fun! Who doesn’t like glow products!? People have always been fascinated with things that light up and glow! We have had a great time exploring the world of glow products and finding new ways to enjoy light up products!

Bright – Our light up football features not 1, but 2 LED lights for up to 30 hours of evening play on the field, at the beach, and even during camping.
Impact Activated – Ready, set, glow! This LED football illuminates from the inside with a tap and automatically shuts off when not in use.
Durable – These light up balls sport a sturdy, water-resistant exterior and use grommets to help keep the LED lights secured in their compartments.
Setup – Each glow football comes with instructions and batteries. Simply inflate using a pump to start passing, punting, and scoring away.
Football Gifts – If you’re fumbling to find the perfect present for the football fan in your life, our LED football is just the surprise your gift receiver will appreciate.

Wonder what it’s like to play football at night? Our regulation-sized, glow-in-the-dark football has 2 LED lights that turn on as soon as you tap the ball. When you’re done playing, the LEDs power off after 40 seconds of inactivity.

Read more

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Do-It-All Screen for every side of life. Get work done without a PC, with the installed Microsoft Office 365, or by remote access to your office computer. Then switch to pure entertainment with the on-board one-stop entertainment system. Lean into projects, ace assignments or binge late into the night with a screen that can truly do it all. Work in Full HD or stream from your favorite Smart TV apps with built-in speakers and remote control. Whether you only have space for one screen, or need a screen that can serve multiple functions, Samsung Smart Monitors make working from home a breeze. Work and learn efficiently and seamlessly from anywhere. Bring the office experience home with an immersive screen, and PC on Screen features. You can even use wireless DeX from your mobile phone to conveniently unlock a full PC experience, without any PC. *World’s first monitor to combine OTT media service, mobile connectivity, and remote PC capabilities. On-screen content simulated for demonstration purpose. **App availability may vary by country. Subscription required. Remote control specifications may vary by country. TV tuner not included. ***Apple and AirPlay 2 are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. Wireless connection to DeX only available on Galaxy Note20, TabS7, and Galaxy Z Fold2 models. Limited to selected apps and may require license purchase. On-screen content simulated for demonstration purpose. ****Windows 10 Pro, Mac OS 10.5, or higher, and compatible network settings are required for this feature. On-screen content simulated for demonstration purpose.
DO IT ALL, MAKE IT BIG: Go bigger, work smarter and enjoy more – with a versatile screen that maximizes productivity and enhances entertainment*.Aspect Ratio:16:9. Viewing Angle (Horizontal/Vertical) 178°(H)/178°(V)
STREAM ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT: Binge watching got even easier. Access entertainment apps, such as Netflix, YouTube, and HBO, without switching on your PC or laptop; The remote control and built-in speakers simplify your chill time**
MOBILE MEETS BIG SCREEN: Wireless DeX unlocks a full PC experience, without any PC; Use mobile productivity apps, such as video conferencing, documents, and browsers, through just your monitor and phone; To see photos or watch movies on the big screen, just tap it with your phone using Tap View***
WORLD’S FIRST AIRPLAY 2 MONITOR: With a first-of-its-kind AirPlay 2 integration, use Apple devices to work and play on the big screen; Improve workflow by creating a wireless dual monitor setup with your MacBook and Smart Monitor
WORK AND LEARN FROM A DISTANCE: Work seamlessly from anywhere; Boost your productivity with PC on Screen features; Using the Microsoft 365 suite, view and edit documents, and conveniently save them all on the cloud****
CONNECT WITH CONVENIENCE: The USB type-C port enables you to power up, transmit data and send display signals between devices with just one connection; Its single connection architecture brings an enjoyable work environment that’s free of clutter and stress
ADAPTIVE PICTURE: Sensational picture, day or night; Surrounding light is detected by a sensor to adjust brightness automatically with Adaptive Picture
